frontMatter.title: the Boring Stuff with Python
frontMatter.summary: 我正在看【Automate the Boring Stuff with Python】，分享给你，一起看吧！ https://automatetheboringstuff.com/

prev.title: The Status of HTTP/3
prev.summary: HTTP/3 is the next protocol for network communication across the Web, which is meant to partially replace HTTP/1 and HTTP/2. One month before the next QUIC Working Group meeting, to be held in Zurich next February, it may be useful to recap what HTTP/3 promises and what its current client/server support looks like.

next.title: 如何＂严肃＂阅读一本书？
next.summary: 一本书读过之后, 当再次拿起来的时候, 仿佛读新书一样;  读了, 看了, "劳民伤财"投入大量时间与精力, 但是记不住怎么办?  本文试图解决这个问题
